thread.section_title: Speke Resort and Conference Centre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A diamond in the rough
thread.title_full: A diamond in the rough - Review of Speke Resort and Conference Centre, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Jim H
title: A diamond in the rough
text: Speke Resort is like a western oasis crammed into the chaotic squalor that is most of Kampala. The place is clean and calm, security is good, and the staff are solicitous. The rooms are comfortable, but not luxurious, and the breakfast buffet was excellent. If you MUST go to Kampala, I recommend this fine property.
